document.full_text: the shares of qihoo 360 technology co ltd, china's third most-popular internet company, soared in their debut on the new york stock exchange on wednesday in an echo of the chinese technology ipo euphoria of late 2010.
document.title: qihoo 360 shares more than double in nyse debut
lines_and_colors: the shares of qihoo 360 technology co ltd, china's third most-popular internet company, soared in their debut on the new york stock exchange on wednesday in an echo of the chinese technology ipo euphoria of late 2010.
